LanguageData.RK_KingHamster.label: king hamster
LanguageData.RK_KingHamster.description: A giant, docile rodent that is several orders of magnitude larger than ordinary hamsters, and adapts relatively well to hot climates. Despite their limited intelligence, they can be tamed and used as pack animals.
LanguageData.RK_KingHamster.tools.0.label: head
LanguageData.RK_KingHamster.tools.1.label: left paw
LanguageData.RK_KingHamster.tools.2.label: right paw
LanguageData.RK_Leather_KingHamster.label: king hamster fur
LanguageData.RK_Leather_KingHamster.description: The furry pelt of a king hamster. The unique cuteness of a hamster is easily recognizable, despite being harvested from an oversized rodent. Good at temperature regulation in hot climates.
LanguageData.RK_Wool_KingHamster.label: king hamster wool
LanguageData.RK_Wool_KingHamster.description: Soft, light and provides very good insulation. King hamster wool clothes can keep the body warm and well-ventilated, even in extreme conditions.
